thread.title: Win tickets to home nations rugby with Vitality
thread.title_full: Win tickets to home nations rugby with Vitality - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win tickets to home nations rugby with Vitality
text: Rugby-mania is sweeping across the world and the good news for fans is you won’t have to wait long for your next dose. The RBS 6 Nations kicks off again on 6 February 2016 and thanks to Vitality being the proud Official Wellness Partner of England Rugby, Scottish Rugby and the Welsh Rugby Union, you can win much-sought-after match tickets and money-can’t-buy experiences as prizes to Telegraph readers. Vitality offers a unique approach to insurance that encourages healthier living and rewards members for doing so. Vitality's support of individual, grass-roots and elite sport is one expression of its commitment to creating a healthier society and also enables it to offer these fantastic prizes in this free-to-enter prize draw. Five readers will win one of the following prizes… Tickets to England v Wales at Twickenham Stadium in 2016 • Three winners will each win two tickets to England v Wales at Twickenham Stadium on 12 March, 2016 Tickets to a Scotland home match at BT Murrayfield in 2016 • Two tickets to a Scotland home fixture at BT Murrayfield Stadium during the 2016 RBS 6 Nations; and… • Two invitations to attend a Scotland training session at BT Murrayfield Stadium the day before the match Tickets to a Wales home match at Principality Stadium in 2016 • Two tickets to a Wales home match at Principality Stadium during the 2016 RBS 6 Nations; and… • Two invitations to attend the Captain’s Run training session at Principality Stadium the day before the match Simply complete the form below by 29 November, 2015 for the chance to win one of these amazing prizes: Online Form - Win tickets to home nations rugby with Vitality
